notes: High-end modern apartment with recessed lighting, decorative ceiling moldings, and quality finishes. The spacious open living area has polished tile floors, while bedrooms feature hardwood flooring and built-in shelving. Very clean condition with ample natural light; the raised platform near the TV area could be a minor tripping hazard for a crawling baby, but overall the layout is baby-friendly with no visible stairs or concerning balcony access in these images.
